item.title: PREP
item.description: PREP PREP is a framework for making your point. PREP: Point + Reason + Example + Point Point: Make a point; PREP is a good method. Reason: Give the reason; Because it has a clear logic. Example: Show examples; The famous XYZ did ABC then everyone was convinced. Point: State the point for a conclusion.

item.title: SCQ-A
item.description: SCQ-A SCQ-A: Situation + Conflict + Question + Answer SCA-A is a framework for problem-solving. Situation: background knowledge, set the stage Complications: what is happening Question: propose your hypothesis Answer: accept or reject the hypothesis
